summary:
Significant experience of product development, product management, solution architect, team management,  project management and business analyst with more than 17 years’ in telecommunication, GSM, fix and mobile line service provider, banking, airline and travel sector. 
Team management, manager of technical and business analyst team, up to 8 person 
Project management, responsible of project planning, account management, third-party, vendor management, cross over different locations. 
Product management, budget management, responsible of cost saving, product & service owner, resource planning. 
Experienced at e-commerce, digital channel applications, CRM, OMNI Channel, loyalty management systems, infrastructure migration, billing transform project, broadband technologies, mobile application, usability, user experience, accessibility, campaign management, e-archive, document management solutions, mernis, call center, customer self-services, dealer management, corporate contract workflow, business process management applications, PMI, IIBA, ISTQB, agile, scrum methodologies and CMMI, ITIL, TMForum Frameworks.

IT Skills
ISTQB Advanced Level Certified Test Analyst
IBM Filenet Enterprise Content Manager, Process Engine p8 , IBM Filenet 5.2
HP PPM Project Protfolio Management, HP Application Lifecycle Management ALM, Jira, Atlassian Confluence 
IBM Rational Software Modeler 7.0.5.3, Rational RequisitePro, Enterprise Architect 7.1 – UML CASE Tool
TMForum framework, CMMI, ITIL, COBIT, PMI, IIBA and agile methodologies 
Toad for Oracle, Toad for MySQL, SQL*Plus, PL/SQL
MS-Office (Project Server,Visio 2007) 
Freemind, Xmind, Sharepoint, Netflow workflow, IBM Maximo,  Emptor Telco
SecureCRT, SoapUI

•	Experienced at airline and travel sector, customer loyalty management, CRM, and related digital products (accessible website, mobile app, chatbot)
•	Team management, manager of business & technical analyst team, building team of analyst up to 8 person, coaching their development plan

Ensure project success in desired time and quality.
